One of the best shooters ever made. This game will make you want to get better while also having a good time. While it's true some community members can be rough on you, it's usually a good time getting blasted in the head with a paddy's pub sized shotgun. Check this one out if you like shooters and have somehow missed it for 2 decades.

So CSGO is one f those game you either hate to play or love to play.
That may because your not very skilled at the game or because you are constantly one shot from across the map.
Either the community will either embrace you and help you get better or it will chew you up and spit you back out with a forced uninstall.
I myself aren't that good at the game, but i wouldn't consider myself trash at the game.  It for me depends on what type of game i want to play. If i am playing with friends and just want to have a fun time being absolutely destroyed by the opposite team, or just chatting shit down the mic to unaware teammates that I'm in discord insulting their ass
Or i decide to try an play properly with some amount of skill the game is enjoyable.
I would place it in my top 10 games of all time and in the top 5 multiplayer games. this is due to the absolutely ridiculous hours you can have playing the game.

Don't start playing thinking your good at the game, your not. Just keep playing your get better and soon understand that the negev is best gun in game, pull down and beam the opposite team and get that ace.

Have fun bitches
